data.title: Contact and Location Information
data.meta_description: Contact and Location Information, Division of Motor Vehicles, Delaware
data.text:
Contact Information

A customer service representative may be contacted directly Monday, Tuesday, Thursday, Friday from 8:00 am – 4:00 pm and Wednesday from 11:00 am – 6:30 pm by dialing one of the four DMV phone numbers listed below. In some cases, your call may be transferred to a DMV specialist to provide additional assistance and/or information. A Live Chat option is also available during business hours that will connect you to a customer service representative via the internet to respond to your questions.

Contact Information for Deaf or Hard of Hearing

Deaf or Hard of Hearing individuals seeking DMV information can communicate through 1-800-232-5460 - TDD number Monday, Tuesday, Thursday, Friday from 8:00 am – 4:00 pm and Wednesday from 11:00 am – 6:30 pm.

DMV Location Hours

Monday Tuesday Wednesday Thursday Friday 8:00 AM to 4:30 PM 8:00 AM to 4:30 PM 11:00 AM to 7:00 PM 8:00 AM to 4:30 PM 8:00 AM to 4:30 PM

Holiday Closings

DMV Customer Service Email

Please note, pets are not allowed in the DMV facilities and inspection lanes with the exception of

registered service animals.

Name/Address Phone Number New Castle County Delaware City Division of Motor Vehicles

2101 Mid County Drive

New Castle, Delaware 19720

Directions

Just south of Route 13 and Route 72 intersections, with access from Delaware State Route 1 at exit 152 north or southbound.( ) 302.326.5000 Greater Wilmington Division of Motor Vehicles

2230 Hessler Boulevard

New Castle, Delaware 19720

Directions

The DMV is immediately south of the Rt. 13 and I-495 Interchange. Turn from Rt.13 into Hessler Boulevard, which leads straight into DMV. ( ) 302.434.3200 Kent County Dover Division of Motor Vehicles

303 Transportation Circle

P.O. Box 698

Dover, Delaware 19903

Directions

The DMV is on Transportation Circle, behind the DELDOT building on Rt. 113, just South of the Rt. 13 and 113 split. ( ) 302.744.2500 Sussex County Georgetown Division of Motor Vehicles

23737 DuPont Blvd.

Georgetown, Delaware 19947

Directions

The DMV is Southeast of Georgetown on South Bedford St. extended, and just before the Rt. 113 intersection. ( ) 302.853.1000
